post.title: d300 printing problems
post.content: hi, i have a canon d300 and when printing the photos appear a lot darker than they appear on the laptop/camera screen. i have put my cf card into a sony camera and took the same picture which printed out fine i then put the sony cf card (same make) into my canon and this too printed out fine, so i assume my camera and the cf card are ok. it's just they do not seem to work together, is this possible and should i buy another card? any tips would be most appreciated thanking you in advance steve
